markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Night's Shine](/Feats.aspx?ID=4072) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 83</row>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064); [Night's Glow](/Feats.aspx?ID=4067)

</column>

---

Your power from the moon and stars becomes strong enough to illuminate the night sky. You gain your choice of the [_asterism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=619) or [_touch of the moon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=460) domain spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.

**Special** You can take this feat a second time, gaining the focus spell that you didn't gain the first time. Increase the number of Focus Points in your pool by 1.
name: Night's Shine
